name: Scoot'em & Shoot'em
description:
A space-western mobile puzzle platformer starring the Sheriff and his trusty steed Scooty. Use your revolver, and other weapons, to fly and scoot your way around space exterminating the invading aliens and rescuing Scooty. 

  • Over 40 different levels!
  • 2 unique environments!
    • 3 planned environments
  • Many different mechanics including:
    • Extra bullets to pickup
    • Sound sensitive lasers
    • Moving platforms
    • Portals
  • Over 15 achievements!
  • Hats to customize the Sherrif to look the way you want!
    • More hats to come

Please note that Scoot'em & Shoot'em is actively under development and has a few bugs. The web version of the game is mostly untested and loads slow. We are currently working on improving the performance. Please report any bugs in the comments!

How To Play
  • Tap/click anywhere to shoot
  • Win by reaching your trusty steed Scooty!
    • Challenge yourself to get 3 stars on every level by killing all the aliens! 1 star per alien killed!
Tips
  • Your character will move opposite the direction you tap
    • If you tap up he will move down
    • If you tap down he will move up
    • If you tap right he will move left
    • If you tap left he will move right
  • Momentum is reset completely every time you shoot. Use this to your advantage!
  • Lasers switch whether they are on or off every time you shoot
  • Full screen is recommended for playing on any platform 
Thanks for playing! Please leave a comment! We are trying to make the game as great as possible before we release to the google play store and iOS store!
